Description: Available September 1st -NO BROKER FEE Be the first one to live in this lovely 2 bedroom apartment since it's been renovated! The new renovation includes fresh paint throughout, a new kitchen with dishwasher/disposal, new washer/dryer in unit, separate living room and dining room with working wood burning fireplace, a bonus room perfect for an office, newly rebuilt front and back private porches, new windows, and your own private garage parking is available for additional rent! Just moments from Roslindale Village and the Commuter Rail at Bellevue Station, the location is super convenient to commute downtown. Call or email us today to schedule a tour of this lovely apartment. NO BROKER FEE! FIRST, LAST, SECURITY DUE W/LEASE. NO PETS, SORRY.
